Detailed Description

A sequence of statements to be executed in-order.

'rest' may be undefined. Used rest.defined() to find out.

◆ make() [2/2]

static Stmt Halide::Internal::Block::make ( const std::vector< Stmt > &  stmts)
static

Construct zero or more Blocks to invoke a list of statements in order.

This method may not return a Block statement if stmts.size() <= 1.
